item.title: Friday, April 26, 2024
item.description: This is The Briefing, a daily analysis of news and events from a Christian worldview... Feed: https://albertmohler.com/category/the-briefing/feed/

item.title: The Ghost in Your Phone (Throwback)
item.description: It's hot. A mother works outside, a baby strapped to her back. The two of them breathe in toxic dust, day after day. And they're just two of thousands, cramped so close together it's hard to move, all facing down the mountain of cobalt stone.Cobalt mining is one of the world's most dangerous jobs. And it's also one of the most essential: cobalt is what powers the batteries in your smartphone, your laptop, the electric car you felt good about buying... Feed: https://feeds.npr.org/510333/podcast.xml
